data.name: TitleLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Enter a site map title. Leave this field blank to use the name of the top-level tab as the title.

data.name: ClickableTitleLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the title of the site map is clickable.

data.name: DefaultStateLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map is fully expanded or collapsed by default.

data.name: ControlVisibilityLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the user will see links to fully expand or collapse the site map.

data.name: MapTypeLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map will be rendered with icons and connecting lines.

data.name: UsePageBasedPrioritiesLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map will use page level based priorities.

data.name: MinimumPriorityLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select the minimum page level priority that will be included in the site map.

data.name: ShowHiddenLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map will include hidden tabs.

data.name: ShowDisabledLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map will include disabled tabs. Selecting "Yes (Enabled)" will include disabled tabs in the site map and will allow them to be clicked on. Selecting "Yes (Disabled)" will include disabled tabs but they can not be used for navigation.

data.name: ShowLinksLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map will include links to pages outside of the Portal.

data.name: ShowResultsLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map will include the search results tab.

data.name: ExpandToCurrentPageLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map should expand to reveal the current page / tab.

data.name: SiteMapRootLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select the tab that will serve as the siteMapRoot (top) of your site map.

data.name: LimitBasedOnSiteSettingsLabel.Text
data.value: Limit Site Map Based On Site Settings

data.name: LimitBasedOnSiteSettingsLabel.ToolTip
data.value: Select whether the site map should should only include the pages below the "Home Page" specified in the portal's Site Settings.

data.name: ImagePathLabel.ToolTip
data.value: This setting will allow you to specify your own site map icons. Enter the path of the folder containing the site map icons. The folder containing the site map icons must be below the DotNetNuke siteMapRoot folder.

data.name: ImageFileExtensionLabel.ToolTip
data.value: This setting will allow you to specify the type of icons to use. The default icon set uses GIF images. PNG images can have higher color depth and better transparency. However, PNG images may not render properly on older web browsers.
